ch.ledcom.agent.jmx

Class JmxCustomAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ledcom.agent.jmx.JmxCustomAgent

  • public final class JmxCustomAgent
extends Object
    This CustomAgent will start an RMI Connector Server using only port "ch.ledcom.agent.jmx.port". When used with the javaagent option, it allows a remote connection using JConsole or VisualVM through an SSH tunnel.

    The purpose of this agent is to open a JMX server that will use only one fixed port for all communication instead of two dynamically set ports.

    Code adapted from: https://blogs.oracle.com/jmxetc/entry/connecting_through_firewall_using_jmx

    Author:
    gehel
